User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Social Streamliner application.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user account was created.

ApiCredential.title: ApiCredential
ApiCredential.description: Stores the API credentials for a specific platform for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the credential set.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns these credentials.

appId.description: The App ID for the social media application.

appSecret.description: The App Secret for the social media application.

SocialAccount.title: SocialAccount
SocialAccount.description: Represents a social media account (e.g., Facebook, Instagram) connected by a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the social media account.

userId.description: Reference to the User who owns this social media account. (Relationship: User 1:N SocialAccount)

accountId.description: The unique identifier for the account on the social media platform.

displayName.description: The display name of the account on the social media platform.

ScheduledPost.title: ScheduledPost
ScheduledPost.description: Represents a post scheduled to be published on one or more social media accounts.

id.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled post.

userId.description: Reference to the User who created this scheduled post. (Relationship: User 1:N ScheduledPost)

scheduledTime.description: The date and time when the post is scheduled to be published.

socialAccountIds.description: References to SocialAccounts where this post will be published. (Relationship: SocialAccount N:N ScheduledPost)

TrendingHashtag.title: TrendingHashtag
TrendingHashtag.description: Represents trending hashtags for content aggregation.

id.description: Unique identifier for the trending hashtag.

volume.description: The search volume or usage frequency of the hashtag.

dateObserved.description: The date when the hashtag was observed as trending.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Path-based ownership ensures only the user can access their data.
Stores a user's API credentials for a specific platform. Path-based ownership ensures credentials are secure.
Stores social media account information for a user. Path-based ownership ensures accounts are private.
Stores scheduled posts for a user. Path-based ownership ensures posts are private.
Stores trending hashtags for content aggregation. Globally readable.
